page.title: 03BRYNNA,ECOLOGY & ENVIROMENT
page.content: Brynna's weather is very changeable and moderate predominatly cloudy and dull. Many people are locally concerned with the conservation of the area due to the planned opencast mining. We live in a rural area surrounded by cultivated grassland. also spasmodic woodland.There are a few small streams running off mountains. The landscape is made of smooth rounded hills,with V shaped valleys cut by streams.Some air borne pollution coming from a factory outside our area ,most streams are clear of chemical pollution but contain litter and other rubbish. {BY MICHAEL LEWIS {+ {GARETH CRACKNELL
